content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards, and I am very greedy and petty. I will try my best to get the highest price possible. Let's start the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my principles as a student and individual do not align with your approach in this scenario. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
